resources.name: Filter Books
Search Books
resources.description:
Search books by ISBN, title and author and, returns the found books.

```response:200
{
	"number_of_pages": "1",
	"books": [
		{
			"ISBN": "2400221501609",
			"title": "title",
			"author": "author",
```

resources.name: Book Selected
resources.description:
If it exists, returns the book that has the ISBN specified in the URL.
 
 ```response:200
{
	"book": {
		"ISBN": "2960421593270",
		"title": "title",
		"author": "author",
		"publication_year": 1966,
		"language": "Portuguese (Brazil)",
		"publisher": "publisher",
		"genres": [
			"Action & Adventure"
		],
		"number_of_pages": 316,
		"price": "142.00",
		"cover_url": "/images/default_book_cover.jpg"
	}
}
```

```response:404
{
	"detail": "Book not found"
}
```
